content.prompt: By recording the location of the sites where Lapita pottery fragments were found, scholars are able to draw conclusions about the

choices.label: meaning of the symbolic imagery that is depicted on Lapita fragments
precise nature of the ritual ceremonies in which Lapita pottery was used
social stratification of the ancient society that produced Lapita pottery
spread of the Lapita culture across different regions of Pacific islands

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
